title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When a field is selected in the Type Hierarchy view and the user tries to add Javadoc from the context menu, nothing happens.
EB: The expected behavior is that when the user selects the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu, the Javadoc should be added to the selected field.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Select a field in the Type Hierarchy view 2. Right-click on the selected field and choose 'Add Javadoc' from the context menu.
